title: LEBLANC IS RIDICULOUSLY STRONG
body: Okay, leblanc is way too bloody strong with her kit, it NEEDS to be nurfed its so stupid, at the start of the game lvl 2 q and w = 500 dmg half health with thunderlords. NURF THIS IMMEDIATELY its just ruined my day so many times and its just so dumb and unfair, please for the love of god fix her.

replies.body: "I walk into range of LB Q>W and am mad when she punishes me."

Only way to counter her is to not feed her early so she can snowball. But obviously that's not always realistic and pretty hard sometimes. She can get f'd pretty easily though with CC and (if she isn't to fed)  build some defensive items (which most people don't.) If she did get nerfed though she would be garbage and no one would pick her.
Her late game is pretty trash and only scales well into mid if ahead, just safe pick against her and don't try to trade
